Review.Contenu: Do Not hire this company!!! UltraFix Appliance Repair sent a technician to my home to fix a beverage cooler, the technician arrived reeking of marijuana, after an hour he said the unit was fixed. Within 5 minutes of his departure the unit was not working.  I called Ultrafix and they sent him back a few days later, again he arrived with the smell of marijuana wafting around him. He took a part the unit and worked on it for over an hour, I got a strange feeling he did not know what he was doing. Hindsight, the technician was clearly under the influence of illicit drugs, and I should have never let him in my home. Finally, he said he needed to order a part and that the office would call back the next day.  The next day they called to tell me the unit was not repairable, to just buy a new one.  Unbeknownst to them I had already had a company out that said they COULD fix it but couldn’t come back for a month, the reason I called Ultrafix.  So, I called the original company back and scheduled to have the new part installed.  When the technician arrived with the new part, he saw that parts were missing, parts that were there his last visit before the technician for Ultrafix came.  I immediately called the Ultrafix technician and when he answered I asked about the missing parts, he immediately hung up and would not answer my calls after repeated attempts.  I called the office and spoke with “Ram” the supervisor, he accused me of lying and would not offer any help whatsoever.  So, in a nutshell, they told me to trash a fixable $3000 refrigerator and thinking I was going to throw it out, they stripped parts out of it.  Again, do not hire this company!!!!!
For over two weeks, I have been working with technician. Repairs were never completed, filing for refund.
Very disappointing experience with Adam and his team. Farr the Dallas technician didn’t diagnose my Thermador’s freezer issue.I am not calling them again.
You replaced the heating element in our dishwasher, but it’s still not working. The dishwasher is not producing hot water or drying the dishes.
Still in process of trying to get repairs done.

They fixed the problem, and I’m thankful for that.However…they left water everywhere in the kitchen. Not only that, but the technician had a raunchy window sticker of a girl tied up, a no free rides sticker of two people having sex, and the phone wallpaper, that was left laying around for anyone to see, was a black and white photo of a woman posing in lingerie. I have 3 kids under 5 years old. I would rather not explain to them why his sticker was a woman is tied up.I expected, based on the outside looks of the company — their branding and webpage — that I was hiring thoughtful professionals.Again, they got the problem fixed but I won’t be hiring them again for the lack of awareness.

Review.Titre: Did not speak English not 1 word
Review.Contenu: Did not speak English not 1 word.  Nice people but will not use again. I still have no idea what they did to my appliance. Or why it cost $300.

Review.Titre: They were in contact even though there was issues with the parts not coming in on time.
Review.Contenu: Repairs were made in a timely manner and they got our refrigerator going.
Great service,  quick and on time. This is 2nd time using will use again.

We had an amazing experience with UltraFix. Customer service was above and beyond. Communication could not have been any better. Kept us informed about everything going on. Will definitely use them again in the future if we need any other appliances fixed!
They were very professional and knowledgeable. Also efficient in the time they took to repair the broken parts!

Review.Titre: Service and Repairs done quickly, done right
Review.Contenu: We have used UltraFix before with excellent results. This time was no exception. Refrigerator compressor failed, called UltraFix around 10am, by 2pm it was repaired and working well. The repairman, Victor, was knowledgeable enough to realize the likely cause of the failure based on his knowledge of Kenmore refrigerators. He came with the necessary part and was able to diagnose and repair, clean up and had everything running back to normal before any food went to waste. All for a reasonable price. Thank you, Victor. Job well done.
The phone staff was excellent, timely service call. Professionalism was outstanding.

Review.Titre: We have been having problems with our…Great Experience with UltraFix Appliance
Review.Contenu: We have been having problems with our freezer. Rashad came and instantly knew what the problem was! He was professional, educated, and friendly. I had tried other repair companies with no success. Rashad knew instantly what needed to be done. Thank you, UltraFix for hiring people like Rashad.

Review.Titre: I contacted Ultra Fix Appliance  repair…
Review.Contenu: I contacted Ultra Fix Appliance  repair to service my LG refrigerator. Tech came same day and fixed it for reasonable price. I highly recommend this company and will be using them again.
Excellent, honest, reliable and timely..not sure what else you need.  I use these guys exclusively for my appliance repair needs.

Review.Titre: Ulta fix was always on time and very…
Review.Contenu: Ulta fix was always on time and very professional at all times. I will recommend them to all.
Excellent service and installation. Very good company to work with my installer was very polite and efficient. Very good experience.

Review.Titre: LOVE LOVE LOVE using this company
Review.Contenu: LOVE LOVE LOVE using this company. Fair, Fast & Reliable.
Same day service.  Did what they said they would do.  Now my freezer is working well!
Super convenient, fast and friendly service. Great communication and affordable prices.
Quick response times, very communicative, great service!
Replaced icemaker in refrigerated. Replacement went great.

Review.Titre: The job was done quickly and right
